text: kani varu tamu cesina pramanalanu bhangam ceyatam valana mariyu allah suktulanu tiraskarincatam valana mariyu pravaktalanu an'yayanga campatam valana! Mariyu: "Ma hrdayalu poralato kappabadi unnayi." Ani anatam valana (memu varini siksincamu). Ante kadu, vari satya tiraskaram valana allah vari hrdayalapai mudra vesi unnadu; kabatti varu visvasincina konta matrame
